summary: I've made it clear that I have a huge dislike of Apple's yearly update cycle for their software (and hardware, to be honest).  It's bad from a software perspective because you're giving people a lot of change all at once with a high probability that something will go wrong.  You're also constantly playing catch up with the rest of the world...
title: First Impressions of iOS 18 and The Gang

summary: Nomad Bench provides reusable infrastructure tooling, so you can load test and experiment with Nomad clusters running at scale
title: Nomad Bench: Load testing and benchmarking for Nomad

summary: I can barely convince myself to shower.  I’m not eating much of anything either.  This wave has developed into an avalanche, which believe it or not, has caught me by surprise...
title: ⚫️ A Dispatch from Depression

summary: I had planned to write a post about which text editor I use and why.  Another idea was to write about why my next phone might be a Pixel instead of an iPhone.  But it feels so incredibly boring to write about...
title: Unedited thoughts
